descriptionHtml:
I think cloaks of Skyrim is a wonderfull mod, but the textures are gruesome and very low detailed.
I can't find any HD Version for the Cloaks and as in my other mods i made my own;-)

The mod replaces all Cloakes from "Cloaks of Skyrim" with high resolution textures (nearly 140).
The texture resolution is addictet from the details and the use and is 2k for most capes and 4k for the most cloaks.

[youtube]ahtbgnGN3yk[/youtube]

At 7:12
[youtube]LKbMpw-Mc-k[/youtube]

Version 3 Work in Progress:
Planned for the new Version
- desaturate the colored robes
- recolor the guard robes - better fitting to guard armors
- remake the UV of the cloaks to reduce file size and make better ingame performance
- make alternate versions f.e. necromancer robe

First install the original mod:
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092/?
Second, replace my textures and meshes with the original ones.

Version 2.0 uses DXT1 dds files, so the texture data size could be reduced by 50 percent.
Fixed some crooked icons and remade some for a better look.

<<<Size>>>
Original Cloaks of Skyrim:
File Size zipped 80 MB
Unzipped 250 MB
Texture Resolution:
Capes 1024 x 1024
Cloaks 1024 x 1024

Nerevars - Cloaks of Skyrim Ultra HD:
File Size zipped 90 MB
Unzipped 500 MB
Texture Resolution:
Capes 2048 x 2048
Cloaks 4096 x 4096

I'll hope we will enjoy;-)
